narrative.title: 6Th Australian Division 2Nd Aif - 1941Q3
narrative.situation: British Commonwealth Infantry Division deployed in North Africa during 1941Q3.
narrative.objectives: Infantry Division - all-arms combined operations with British armor support when needed
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Experienced in desert warfare from North Africa campaigns
Amphibious operations experience from Greece and Crete
Mountain warfare capability from Greece campaign
High morale and esprit de corps despite heavy losses
